Description: Unique identifier for credit card record
Reference to user who owns the card
Reference to physical item being listed
Type/style of shoe (e.g. sneaker or boot)
Condition of shoe (new or used etc.)
Asking price or starting bid amount
Type of listing (auction or buy-now etc.)
Cost to ship order to buyer
Tax rate percentage applied to order
Total order amount including tax and shipping
Date and time order was placed
Current status of order (processing or shipped etc.)
Final sale price of the listing
Shipping carrier name (UPS or FedEx etc.)
Unique identifier assigned upon warehouse receipt
Reference to seller who shipped item (no FK constraint)
Current status (received or authenticated or listed or returned)
Reference to user submitting request (no FK constraint)
Contact email (may differ from account email)
Reference to related order if applicable (no FK constraint)
How customer contacted support (phone or email or chat)
